translations: 分配；约会；指定；[经] 转让

sentences.sentence: She had an assignation with her boyfriend.
sentences.translation: 她和她男友幽会了一次。

sentences.sentence: In the Assignation, a married woman plans to meet her fancy man when her husband goes to the exchange.
sentences.translation: 《约会》讲述了一个已婚女子趁丈夫去交易所时，跟她的情夫约会。

sentences.sentence: Dietary intake, food construction and origin, food resource production, applying, assignation, eating model and so on.
sentences.translation: 膳食营养摄入量，食物结果与来源，生产加工，就餐模式。
